name: bleak-monorepo
description: Bleak - The Chatbot API that returns UI components, not plain text

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run uvicorn backend.src.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8008
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && uv run --active uvicorn backend.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8008

author: bernatsampera
